title: Profitability of small finance banks expected to decline in FY25: Crisil
description: Small finance banks' return on assets is projected to drop to 1.7% this fiscal year from 2.1% due to lower net interest margins and higher credit costs. However, they will still outperform the overall banking system. Rising delinquencies in microfinance and unsecured segments will also impact profitability.
